#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
ll a[1000010],ans[1000010];
int main()
{
	ll n,i,l,count,pos,k=1,ans1;
	cin>>n;
	l=0;
	for(i=0;i<n;++i)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
		if(l<a[i])
		{
			l=a[i];
			pos=i;
		}
	}
	//cout<<pos<<endl;
	ans[0]=pos;
	for(i=pos+1;i<n;++i)
	{
		if(a[i]==l)
			ans[k++]=i;		
	}
	count=1;
	ans1=0;
	for(i=1;i<k;++i)
	{
		if(ans[i]==ans[i-1]+1)
			++count;
		else
		{
			ans1=max(ans1,count);
			count=1;
		}
	}
	ans1=max(ans1,count);
	cout<<ans1<<endl;
	return 0;
}
